TopicTitle: fuel transfert - ALL TANKS at once

Articles.Content: is there any way or a mod that allow to tranfert fuel from the tanker to ALL tanks.. i mean, for a ship with multiple little tanks, like a lander, is heavy to refuel, having to select every tank one after an other. if there is a way to tranfert from the "source ship" to ALL tanks of the same kind on the "target ship" will made fuel transfert way less heavy to do ( my heavy lander have his main tanks, but also about 10 extra small tanks on the side... kinda heavy to refill all )

There's this

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/67163-0-23-5-Goodspeed-Automatic-Fuel-Pump-v2-14-1

Don't know if it works in .25, but I used it in .24.2 and it worked great. Takes a little experimenting to figure out how to set it up.

There's this

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/67163-0-23-5-Goodspeed-Automatic-Fuel-Pump-v2-14-1

Don't know if it works in .25, but I used it in .24.2 and it worked great. Takes a little experimenting to figure out how to set it up.

Works well with .25 you just need to set up tank priority are higher number than tanks that you want to get fuelled up.

It can also balance fuel tanks ( very usefull for planes when shifting CoM is important ).

It is also possible to setup additional resources not included in mod by default ( by adding few lines to config file ).

Only downside is that it wont work for old ships only for designed after adding mod.
